author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE GRADUALLY MOVING AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND BUT CONTINUES  TO BRING GUSTY WINDS AND WIDESPREAD RAINFALL...
summary:
...HONE GRADUALLY MOVING AWAY FROM THE BIG ISLAND BUT CONTINUES  TO BRING GUSTY WINDS AND WIDESPREAD RAINFALL...
 As of 8:00 AM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 18.5, -156.6
 with movement W at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 990 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Hone (CP1/CP012024)
